subject: ATTN: BENEFICIARY, REF/MTCN No
body:
ATTN: BENEFICIARY, REF/MTCN No {2334167617} Sender's Name:  Rene
I am here to inform you that your total fund of $5.5 Million has been deposited with (Western Union) for immediate transferring of it to you, You will be receiving $5,000 USD per day, Your first payment Batch has been programmed in our system. But 
you have to pay $125 for the activation of your first payment file 
through western union office.
Note: This $125usd is the only fee you are required to pay hence this Transaction is concerned, No Authority or any body should ask you for additional money after the payment of $125 Therefore, the days of you being subjected to paying twice is over as that is the case with some corrupt officials, who always strife to subject beneficiaries to hard bureaucratic bottle-neck, thereby making it impossible for most innocent citizens and the likes to claim what rightfully belongs to them.
Thank God that your funds are here in WESTERN UNION, if you consciously adhere to the above instruction by remitting the Procurement Fee calculated to be $125 USD The “Procurement Fee" of $125 USD is payable in three (3) payment options from which you are to choose the one you prefer.If you wish to send by Western union office You can Send the fee of $125 by Western union transfer OR RIA money office and steam gift card You are hereby advice to send this complete information to avoid wrong transfer of fund.
BELOW IS THE MTCN AND TRACKING WEBSITE TO ENABLE YOU TRACK YOUR FIRST PROGRAMMED APPROVED PAYMENT.
https: // www. westernunion.com/global-service/track-transfer
MTCN#::2334167617
Amount Programmed: $5000
PLEASE YOU ARE REQUIRED TO RECONFIRM THIS INFORMATION BELOW.
Your full name.....
your contact address...

your phone number....

Yours faithfully,
Dr. Goodnews Idah  Managing Director

Western Union Foreign Operation

subject: Re: ATTN: BENEFICIARY, REF/MTCN No
body:
Hello Dr. Goodnews Idah,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. It's quite exciting to hear about this fund deposited with Western Union. I'm a bit confused though, could you please explain more about the activation of my first payment file? 

Also, I'm curious about the fee of USD that needs to be paid. Could you provide more details on why this fee is necessary and how it contributes to the process?

I noticed that there are three payment options mentioned - Western Union transfer, RIA money office, and steam gift card. Could you elaborate on these options? How do they work and which one would be most convenient?

Regarding the MTCN and tracking website, could you guide me on how to use them? I'm not very familiar with these tools.

Lastly, I understand that you need some information from me. However, due to privacy concerns, I prefer not to share personal details over email. Is there another secure way we can handle this?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Maria

subject: Re: ATTN: BENEFICIARY, REF/MTCN No
body:
Attn:Maria,

This is to acknowledge the receipt of your email in regard to your fund transfer. The Federal Government named the Federal Ministry of Finance and The Economic Community Of West African States (ECOWAS). have been approved fund $5.5million Usd for settlement of affected victims in which Your name and your email address was shortlisted.I want you to know that your first payment of $5,000 USD will be transfer to you immediately we receive the $125usd for the activation of your Western Union VAT File to entitle you to receiving your daily payments till done

Use Ria money transfer to send the fee $125usd or go to apple store and buy steam gift card or itunes gift card $125usd.

subject: Re: ATTN: BENEFICIARY, REF/MTCN No
body:
Hello Dr. Goodnews Idah,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. It's quite interesting to hear about this fund transfer from the Federal Government and ECOWAS. I must say, it's a surprise!

I'm curious about a few things though. Could you please explain more about how my name and email address were selected for this? Also, could you provide more details on what the Western Union VAT File is?

Regarding the payment method, I'm not very familiar with Ria money transfer or purchasing gift cards from Apple Store or Steam. Could you guide me through these processes?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Maria

Thank you for reaching out to me! I'm always excited to meet new people and learn about what they do. As the Managing Director, you must have a lot of responsibilities and interesting stories to share.
